title: Mirror of Germany. No. 217 = Deutschland Spiegel

Hobbies, Recreation & Sport/Olympic Games (20th : 1972 : Munich, Germany)
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The 1972 Olympic Games held in Munich - some highlights of the sporting events; swimming, sprinting, pole-vaulting, canoeing, yachting are shown; Munich as the Olympic city; the disastrous Israeli murders by Palestinian terrorists and resulting suspension of the Games for 24 hours; the Games recommence and some final sporting events are shown in a less festive mood and the closing ceremony.
